jobDescription: Immigration Data Analyst  Salary: DOE  3-5 years of Global immigration-related experience required  A Boston law firm is in search of an Immigration Data Analyst. If you have strong data analysis experience and excellent communication skills, apply today!  Responsibilities  Immigration Data Analyst will support the global mobility team by preparing and filing non-U.S. employment-based nonimmigrant and immigrant petitions for clients Provide overall coordination and management of junior paralegal tasks Prepare business visitor visa applications Perform duties required by our global mobility team Coordinate collection of required legal documentation as required Research requirements in various jurisdictions Requirements  Bachelor’s Degree 3-5 years of Global immigration-related experience Ability to manage junior paralegals and high-volume, high-touch clientele Strong time management and organizational skills Strong skills in Microsoft Excel Excellent communication and problem solving skills
